entry.title: About This Website
entry.content:
How have I built this website?

General

  • Built with: Jekyll
  • Hosted service: GitHub Pages
  • Domain provider: Namecheap

Content Generator

  • Table of content: Tocify.js
  • Mathematics: mathjax
  • Pseudocode: Pseudocode.js and KaTeX
  • PDF: LaTeX on Overleaf

Libraries

  • JavaScript: jQuery
  • Content templating - CSS: Bootstrap
  • Markdown templating - CSS: minima
  • Icons: Font Awesome

Inspirations

  • Overall design and content: Gwern Branwen
entry.summary: How have I built this website? General Built with: Jekyll Hosted service: GitHub Pages Domain provider: Namecheap

entry.title: Study Notes
entry.content:
Summer 2019

For this summer, I will attempt to study TensorFlow in Practice, Deep Learning Specialization, Advanced Machine Learning Specialization, and Reinforcement Learning Specialization to review these topics, build more relevant projects to these topics, and construct a curriculum for the AI Club. Career Success Specialization and Understanding the Brain: The Neurobiology of Everyday Life to improve my general understanding.

  • Convolutional Neural Networks in TensorFlow
  • Natural Language Processing in TensorFlow
  • Sequences, Time Series and Prediction
